title: Bug 130068 - Report Parameter window not appearing during report preview with parameters
description:
Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when preview a report with parameter. Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application and log in to your account.
OB: When attempting to preview a report that contains parameters, the Report Parameter window does not appear as expected.
EB: The expected behavior is that when previewing a report with parameters, the Report Parameter window should pop up, allowing users to input or select the necessary parameter values before generating the report.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the application.
2. Log in to your account.
